resources.string: You are the best palyer in the world!!!

FC Barcelona are often criticised for getting their stars to publicly speak about players who are linked with the club, but that has not stopped superstar Lionel Messi, who has once again discussed the Blaugrana\'s potential signing of Antoine Griezmann.Messi, who has previously said he would welcome Griezmann at the Camp Nou, has again insisted the 27-year-old is one of the best in the business and that he would suit the Catalans.TED2018, Flimed Apr 2018

You are the best player in the world
